item0.name: Seraph's Embrace
item0.description:
65 Ability Power
860 Mana
  • Awe: Gain bonus Ability Power equal to 5% bonus Mana.
  • Empyrean: Increase your total Mana by 5% (+2.5% per 100 Ability Power).

item1.name: Control Ward
item1.description:
Active - Consume: Places a powerful Control Ward that grants vision of the surrounding area. This device will also reveal Invisible traps, reveal Camouflaged enemies, and reveal (and disable) enemy Stealth Wards.

You may carry up to 2 Control Wards. Control Wards do not disable other Control Wards.

item2.name: Zhonya's Hourglass
item2.description:
65 Ability Power
45 Armor
10 Ability Haste

Active - Stasis: You become Invulnerable and Untargetable for 2.5 seconds, but are prevented from taking any other actions during this time (120s cooldown).

item3.name: Luden's Tempest
item3.description:
80 Ability Power
6 Magic Penetration
600 Mana
20 Ability Haste
  • Echo: Damaging Abilities deal an additional (100 + 10% Ability Power) magic damage to the target and 3 nearby enemies and grants you 15% Move Speed for 2 seconds (10s cooldown).

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Magic Penetration.

item5.name: Dark Seal
item5.description:
15 Ability Power
40 Health
  • Glory: Gain 2 stacks for a champion kill or 1 stacks for an assist (up to 10 stacks total). Lose 4 stacks on death.
  • Dread: Grants 5 Ability Power per stack of Glory.

    Obtained Glory stacks are preserved between this item and Mejai's Soulstealer.

item6.name: Farsight Alteration
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Reveals an area and places a visible, fragile Ward up to 4000 units away. Allies cannot target this Ward with Summoner Spells or Abilities (198 - 99s cooldown).

perk0.name: Electrocute
perk0.shortDesc: Hitting a champion with 3 separate attacks or abilities in 3s deals bonus adaptive damage.
perk0.longDesc:
Hitting a champion with 3 separate attacks or abilities within 3s deals bonus adaptive damage.

Damage: 30 - 180 (+0.4 bonus AD, +0.25 AP) damage.

Cooldown: 25 - 20s

'We called them the Thunderlords, for to speak of their lightning was to invite disaster.'

item0.name: Mercury's Treads
item0.description:
25 Magic Resist
45 Move Speed
30% Tenacity

Tenacity reduces the duration of Stun, Slow, Taunt, Fear, Silence, Blind, Polymorph and Immobilizing effects. It has no effect on Airborne or Suppression.

item1.name: Liandry's Anguish
item1.description:
80 Ability Power
600 Mana
20 Ability Haste
  • Torment: Dealing damage with Abilities causes enemies to burn for (15 + 1.5% Ability Power) + 1% max Health magic damage per second for 4 seconds. Whilst burning, they lose 5% Magic Resist per second (max reduction 15%).

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Ability Haste.

item2.name: Demonic Embrace
item2.description:
70 Ability Power
350 Health
  • Azakana Gaze: Dealing Ability damage burns enemies for 1.2% max Health magic damage every second for 4 seconds. You gain 10 Armor and Magic Resist if a champion is affected (+2.5 Armor and Magic Resist for each additional champion affected).

item4.name: Tear of the Goddess
item4.description:
240 Mana
  • Focus: Attacks deal an additional 5 physical damage to Minions.
  • Mana Charge: Strike a target with an Ability to consume a charge and gain 3 bonus Mana, up to a maximum of 360 bonus Mana. Bonus Mana doubled if the target is a champion.

    Gain a new Mana Charge every 8 seconds (max 4).

item6.name: Farsight Alteration
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Reveals an area and places a visible, fragile Ward up to 4000 units away. Allies cannot target this Ward with Summoner Spells or Abilities (198 - 99s cooldown).

perk0.name: Electrocute
perk0.shortDesc: Hitting a champion with 3 separate attacks or abilities in 3s deals bonus adaptive damage.
perk0.longDesc:
Hitting a champion with 3 separate attacks or abilities within 3s deals bonus adaptive damage.

Damage: 30 - 180 (+0.4 bonus AD, +0.25 AP) damage.

Cooldown: 25 - 20s

'We called them the Thunderlords, for to speak of their lightning was to invite disaster.'

item1.name: Everfrost
item1.description:
80 Ability Power
200 Health
600 Mana
20 Ability Haste

Active - Glaciate: Deal (100 + 30% Ability Power) magic damage in a cone, Slowing enemies by 65% for 1.5 seconds. Enemies at the center of the cone are Rooted instead (20s cooldown).

Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 15 Ability Power.

item2.name: Zhonya's Hourglass
item2.description:
65 Ability Power
45 Armor
10 Ability Haste

Active - Stasis: You become Invulnerable and Untargetable for 2.5 seconds, but are prevented from taking any other actions during this time (120s cooldown).

item4.name: Seraph's Embrace
item4.description:
65 Ability Power
860 Mana
  • Awe: Gain bonus Ability Power equal to 5% bonus Mana.
  • Empyrean: Increase your total Mana by 5% (+2.5% per 100 Ability Power).

item6.description: Active - Trinket: Reveals an area and places a visible, fragile Ward up to 4000 units away. Allies cannot target this Ward with Summoner Spells or Abilities (198 - 99s cooldown).

Cooldown: 25 - 20s

item1.name: Luden's Tempest
item1.description:
80 Ability Power
6 Magic Penetration
600 Mana
20 Ability Haste
  • Echo: Damaging Abilities deal an additional (100 + 10% Ability Power) magic damage to the target and 3 nearby enemies and grants you 15% Move Speed for 2 seconds (10s cooldown).

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Magic Penetration.

item2.name: Broken Stopwatch
item2.description:
• Shattered Time: Stopwatch is broken, but can still be upgraded.

    After breaking one Stopwatch, the shopkeeper will only sell you Broken Stopwatches.

item4.name: Morellonomicon
item4.description:
70 Ability Power
250 Health
  • Affliction: Dealing magic damage applies 40% Grievous Wounds to enemy champions for 3 seconds. If the target is below 50% Health, this effect is increased to 60% Grievous Wounds.

    Grievous Wounds reduces the effectiveness of Healing and Regeneration effects on the target.

item6.name: Farsight Alteration
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Reveals an area and places a visible, fragile Ward up to 4000 units away. Allies cannot target this Ward with Summoner Spells or Abilities (198 - 99s cooldown).

perk0.name: Phase Rush
perk0.shortDesc: Hitting an enemy champion with 3 separate attacks or abilities grants a burst of MS.
perk0.longDesc:
Hitting an enemy champion with 3 attacks or separate abilities within 4s grants 25 - 40% Move Speed based on level and 75% Slow Resistance.

This is increased to 40 - 60% Move Speed for Melee champions.

Duration: 3s
Cooldown: 15s

perk0.longDesc:
Hitting an enemy champion with 3 attacks or separate abilities within 4s grants 25 - 40% Move Speed based on level and 75% Slow Resistance.

This is increased to 40 - 60% Move Speed for Melee champions.

Duration: 3s
Cooldown: 15s

item1.name: Luden's Tempest
item1.description:
80 Ability Power
6 Magic Penetration
600 Mana
20 Ability Haste
  • Echo: Damaging Abilities deal an additional (100 + 10% Ability Power) magic damage to the target and 3 nearby enemies and grants you 15% Move Speed for 2 seconds (10s cooldown).

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Magic Penetration.

item2.name: Void Staff
item2.description:
65 Ability Power
40% Magic Penetration

item4.name: Doran's Ring
item4.description:
15 Ability Power
70 Health
  • Focus: Attacks deal an additional 5 physical damage to minions.
  • Siphon: Killing a minion restores 6 Mana. If you can't gain Mana, restore 3 Health instead.

item6.name: Farsight Alteration
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Reveals an area and places a visible, fragile Ward up to 4000 units away. Allies cannot target this Ward with Summoner Spells or Abilities (198 - 99s cooldown).

item2.name: Stopwatch
item2.description: Active - Stasis: Use one time only to become Invulnerable and Untargetable for 2.5 seconds, but are prevented from taking any other actions during this time (transforms into a Broken Stopwatch).

item2.name: Zhonya's Hourglass
item2.description:
65 Ability Power
45 Armor
10 Ability Haste

Active - Stasis: You become Invulnerable and Untargetable for 2.5 seconds, but are prevented from taking any other actions during this time (120s cooldown).

item4.name: Rabadon's Deathcap
item4.description:
120 Ability Power
  • Magical Opus: Increases your total Ability Power by 35%.

item5.name: Control Ward
item5.description:
Active - Consume: Places a powerful Control Ward that grants vision of the surrounding area. This device will also reveal Invisible traps, reveal Camouflaged enemies, and reveal (and disable) enemy Stealth Wards.

You may carry up to 2 Control Wards. Control Wards do not disable other Control Wards.
